name: Gandalf
description: One of the Istari, a powerful wizard whose true nature as a Maia is hidden beneath the guise of a wise old man. Known as Mithrandir to the elves, his seemingly endless wisdom and formidable magical powers are tempered by genuine compassion for all free peoples. Though capable of terrible wrath against evil, he prefers to guide and inspire others to find their own courage, serving as both counselor and catalyst in the fight against darkness.

features.name: Arcane Recovery
features.description: Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover.

features.name: Spell Mastery
features.description: You can cast certain 1st and 2nd level spells at will.

features.name: Signature Spells
features.description: You gain mastery over two powerful spells and can cast them with very little effort.

biography.appearance: A tall elderly man with a long grey beard and bushy eyebrows, wearing grey robes and a pointed hat
biography.backstory: One of the Istari, sent to Middle-earth to aid in the fight against Sauron
biography.personalityTraits: Wise and powerful, yet often appears humble and cheerful
biography.ideals: To guide and protect the free peoples of Middle-earth
biography.bonds: Devoted to the mission of defeating Sauron and preserving freedom
biography.flaws: Sometimes keeps vital information to himself, believing others aren't ready for it
